name: BuildPipelinePostBuild
description: Encapsulates tasks to be performed after the build/compile phase of the build pipeline
author: Aderant

inputs.name: limitBuildWarnings
inputs.label: Build Warning Ratchet
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies if the build will be failed if the number of warnings increase relative to the last good build on the master branch.

inputs.name: cleanBuildDirectoryOnCompletion
inputs.label: Clean build directory on completion
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies if the build scratch directory will be cleaned if the build completes successfully. Enabling this means that no build artifacts will be available after this task completes.
